level.heading: Establishment of agency agreements between affiliated depository institutions.
level.text: A District state bank that is a subsidiary of a bank holding company may agree to receive deposits, renew time deposits, close loans, service loans, receive payments on loans and other obligations, and perform such other services as the Superintendent may determine are appropriate, as an agent for a depository institution affiliate.
